example.code:
PS C:\>Get-IAMAttachedUserPolicies -UserName "Bob"
PolicyArn PolicyName --------- ---------- arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/TesterPolicy TesterPolicy
example.description: This command returns the names and ARNs of the managed policies for the IAM user named Bob in the AWS account. To see the list of inline policies that are embedded in the IAM user, use the Get-IAMUserPolicies command.
